TRYTOBEGOOD
  • Portfolio
  • About
Designer, writer, tinkerer, current resident at DBRS Innovation Labs, and a DJ and talkshow host on bel-air radio with a MFA from Parsons Design and Technology.

Personal initiatives

Potential in storytelling

new mercy park

Design

Web-based narrative that is part alternate reality game, part poetry, and part software tutorial, resulting in an experience that spans months and takes place across chat boxes, emails, and other internet platforms.

the quantified life

Website Design

An embodied Dystopian experience that re-imagines the relationship between ourselves and our work, between the Quantified Self and the Quantified Other, and between quantification and qualification.

The use of simulation

Website Design

March, 2016 residency with artist and developer Francis Tseng at the DBSR Innovation Lab.

Website Design

CCPM

Website Design

CCPM proposes an alternative way of looking at the way we use the devices we rely on the most. What if the the energy we expend and “waste” can be harvested and stored into a battery for later use? Could these typing-powered batteries then be treated as designed objects with their own narratives and sentimental purposes?

CCPM

CCPM proposes an alternative way of looking at the way we use the devices we rely on the most. What if the the energy we expend and “waste” can be harvested and stored into a battery for later use? Could these typing-powered batteries then be treated as designed objects with their own narratives and sentimental purposes?

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Web Development
